OrderTracking System

DESCRIPTION

This project was implemented for the Fudokan Karate Federation located in Limassol. The goal of the system is to provide assistance for the organisation and management of karate tournaments. The system was implemented by a group of three members. My responsibilities were the execution of fair draw and scoresheet management.

DRAW ALGORITHM

The most complex part of this project definately was the design and implementation of the draw algorithm. In order for a draw to be accepted for a tournament it had to follow a set of unique rules and that was a chalenge that I had to solve by creating my own algorithm.
